title: Skill Registry
description: Registry of all skills with agent mappings by category

azure-sql-patterns.description: Azure SQL Database design, performance tuning, and cloud-specific features

tsql-programming.description: T-SQL stored procedures, functions, and advanced programming

sql-performance-tuning.description: Query optimization, indexing strategies, and performance analysis

sql-schema-design.description: Relational database schema design and normalization

cosmos-db-patterns.description: Cosmos DB data modeling, partition strategies, and query optimization

react-patterns.description: React hooks, component patterns, and state management

vue-patterns.description: Vue 3 Composition API, Pinia, and component patterns

nextjs-patterns.description: Next.js App Router, SSR, ISR, and data fetching

angular-patterns.description: Angular signals, standalone components, and RxJS patterns

microservices-patterns.description: Domain-Driven Design, service decomposition, and communication patterns

event-driven-patterns.description: Event Sourcing, CQRS, Saga patterns, and messaging

serverless-patterns.description: Serverless architecture, function composition, and triggers

cqrs-event-sourcing.description: CQRS implementation and Event Sourcing patterns

saga-patterns.description: Distributed transaction management with Saga patterns

architecture-design.description: High-level architecture design and decision making

api-gateway-patterns.description: Azure API Management policies, products, and security

azure-functions-patterns.description: Azure Functions triggers, bindings, and Durable Functions

container-apps-patterns.description: Container Apps configuration, scaling, and Dapr integration

service-bus-patterns.description: Azure Service Bus queues, topics, and message processing

azure-networking-patterns.description: Hub-spoke topology, NSGs, Private Endpoints, and VPN

azure-storage-patterns.description: Blob, Table, Queue, Files services and access control

azure-monitoring-patterns.description: Application Insights, Log Analytics, KQL, and alerting

entra-id-patterns.description: OAuth 2.0, OIDC, MSAL, and Managed Identity patterns

keyvault-patterns.description: Secret management, key rotation, and certificate handling

express-patterns.description: Express.js middleware, routing, and error handling

fastapi-patterns.description: FastAPI async patterns, dependency injection, and Pydantic

nestjs-patterns.description: NestJS modules, decorators, and dependency injection

error-handling.description: Consistent error handling patterns across backends
